The original planned cover art for the h: hop album depicted an exploding World Trade Center.
The cover art was created in June 2001: several months before the September 11th terrorist attacks.
The intended symbolism behind the cover: rather than foreshadowing the events of 9/11.
The cover art was pulled from the group: s label website and redesigned after the September 11th attacks, with the album eventually being released with a different cover design.
